type.name: Main
type.summary:
Rate of Change (ROC), also known as Momentum Oscillator, is the percent change of Close price over a lookback window.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Optional. Number of periods for an ROC SMA signal line.

type.name: WithBands
type.summary:
Rate of Change with Bands (ROCWB) is the percent change of Close price over a lookback window with standard deviation bands.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Number of periods for the ROC EMA line.
Number of periods the standard deviation for upper/lower band lines.
